ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hrrm didn t know they changed size of hate list. I guess that explains why last nuke to hit doesn t get kill most of the time anymore. =) I ve survived quite a
ygData.messageBody:
Hrrm didn't know they changed size of hate list. I guess that explains why
last nuke to hit doesn't get kill most of the time anymore. =) I've survived
quite a few fights, but for some reason haven't taken faction hits most of
the time. I am still warmly (or kindly I forget) to Kunark dragons. I
specifically remember standing under Silverwing and watching Alloria get the
killshot (of all people a cleric) while I was grouped with her. No faction
hit whatsoever. Later I definitely got a hit from Phara Dar, but I am still
not KoS. Only a matter of time I'm sure.

Sartori{Legion}
57th Troubador, Veeshan

>the faction hate list is huge now, no longer only a max of 6 people, so if
>you fight in VP and survive any fights you will get a hit and you will no
>longer be non-KOS to the outdoor dragons or the VP dragons =/ i was warmly
>when i went in, haven't conned anything since but i think i only survived 1
>or 2 fights at the most. i may be non-KOS til next trip.
>
>Shada
